name: distant blues
description:
a tiny castle of machine and paper

(there are a total of six letters that you can find.)

//

my first published bitsy game, in honor of the 5 Years O Bitsy jam!

made using adam le doux's bitsy

with a modified version of david mowatt's bitsymuse hack using howler.js

music produced on logic pro x

mainly using a sample of this dirty keyboard jam i recorded ages ago
